summary: At 10:05, U.S. President Biden and top Republican Kevin McCarthy edge closer to deal to avoid looming U.S. debt default.
At 10:49, the Kremlin said they are tracking Western spy activity after the CIA published a video asking for Russians to make contact through a secure internet channel.
At 14:18, Russia fired Kinzhal missiles at Kyiv, with Ukraine claiming to have shot down all six, and Russia claiming one penetrated air defences and destroyed a Patriot anti-missile system.

At 16:11, a Ukrainian marine brigade shared video footage of cheap drones being used as kamikaze-style weapons against Russian tanks and troops in eastern Ukraine as part of the country's counter-offensive strategy.
